overview: We constantly hear the mantra: “Evolution is science, creation is religion,” or “Evolution is a proven scientific fact.” But is this true? Highlighting the words of evolutionists themselves and examples from biology, geology, and paleontology, Dr. Terry Mortenson demonstrates that evolutionism is really a philosophy . . . a worldview . . . a religion. Don’t be deceived into thinking that the leading proponents of evolution are unbiased, objective pursuers of truth who just “let the facts speak for themselves.” Assumptions matter! This DVD reveals why. (67 minutes)
title: Deep Time Evolution
